entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets mixed with snow this morning then to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers late this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
